content: You can head to Mount Mei as soon as you complete the secret areas and the Treasure Hunter quest. But we've included these bosses as part of Chapter 6, as we'd recommend completing the game first and then pressing CONTINUE, going to Mount Mei and beating the secret bosses there. Beating the final boss again after doing this will unlock the true ending of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 6', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, the Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
You can head to Mount Mei as soon as you complete the secret areas and the Treasure Hunter quest. But we've included these bosses as part of Chapter 6, as we'd recommend completing the game first and then pressing CONTINUE, going to Mount Mei and beating the secret bosses there. Beating the final boss again after doing this will unlock the true ending of the game.
